org.project.osman.process

Class OsmanReadability

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.project.osman.process.OsmanReadability

  • public class OsmanReadability
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry class of the OSMAN Readability package for computing Readability Metrics for Arabic text.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mahmoud El-Haj dr.melhaj@gmail.com

      • countSentences

        public int countSentences(java.lang.String text)
        count number of sentences a) using simpler sentence splitter or b) using Stanford tokenizer (Sentence Splitter) you need to uncomment the code below and include the import statements. a) might not work if all your text is on one line, I recommend you use Stanford sentence splitter instead or your own delimiters.
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
        diacriticised text as string
